rareIllnesses.title: Rare Illnesses
rareIllnesses.subtitle: Explore comprehensive resources for rare diseases and conditions. Learn from expert cases, student experiences, and specialized medical insights.
rareIllnesses.noteText: Rare diseases affect fewer than 1 in 2,000 people. These conditions require specialized knowledge and often involve complex diagnostic approaches.
